title: Louise Redknapp opts for thigh skimming black dress at Pride of Britain awards
text:

Louise Redknapp looked sensational as she opted to put a sexy twist on the classic little black dress for last night’s Pride of Britain awards in London.

The former Strictly star kept her look simple yet stunning in a figure-hugging thigh-high frock, teamed with black tights and matching heels.

The 44-year-old styled her long brown locks in loose waves and opted for half up-do as she posed for photographers at the Grosvenor House hotel in the capital.

Her stunning appearance comes as the former Eternal star gets set to release her new solo album ‘Heavy Love’ - her first in almost two decades.

(Image: PA)

Louise joined a host of other stars for the prestigious event which celebrates the extraordinary achievements of remarkable Brits who have gone above and beyond.

Hosted by Carol Vorderman, this year's award winners include Margaret Walker, a speech therapist who designed a language programme that uses signs, symbols and speech to help people communicate, and seven-year-old Jaydee-Lee Dummett who recognised signs of carbon monoxide poisoning and helped save the lives of her family.
